name: Elite Snipers 3D Warfare Combat
description:
During World War II, two of the American soldiers were given a mission to rescue the soldiers in the custody of a German Army inside a village. When the soldiers reached near the village the enemy snipers welcomed them with bullets. American soldiers have only one sniper and that is you.

Your primary mission is to rescue the American soldier cavalry in captivity of the Germans. But, this mission will phase you with the toughest challenges of your life. You will have to contend with some of the most elite sniper shooters in the world, master in the art of stealth hits. Bring on the best of your skills and you might get out of this one alive!


CONTEST OF SNIPER

Travel through the village battlefield, in 4 deadly missions against the best in class snipers. The snipers will be expert in the art of hiding, taking merge skills to remain hidden in various locations throughout the village.

You will have to locate each sniper with precision, skills and intuition, within the given time limit, ensuring that you aren’t tracked first. The enemy snipers will be stationed at long ranges, hidden in the wilderness, top of communication towers and the national church, meaning that only the ultimate precision shot will eliminate the threat.


FEATURES

- 4 Intense, time based challenges in various locations
- Superb sniper fps controls and bullet hit animations
- Realistic kill animations through high level detailed environments
- Immersive Sniper gameplay experience, with WW2 inspired battlefields and long range sniper shots.
